data.name: Alice
data.text:
cy
BestFriend超爱！！

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 这首歌的宗教意味很浓厚，MV就是在教堂中拍摄的。先看Yelawolf的片段，他作为一个rapper，在与Eminem的合作中，并不是人们通常以为的是两个rapper之间的竞技。相反，Yela并没有如何炫技，而是试着将歌词写得非常深刻

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
[Verse 1: Yelawolf]
Ain't never been much of the church type
But I believe in the last days
I walk through Hell almost every night
But I believe it's a pathway
Say, boy, what you doin' with your life
With those tattos on your face?
Say, boy, you know that you'll pay the price
Well, I guess I'll see when I head that way

data.name: Bob
data.text: 可以可以

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
last days指末世。Yela与Eminem都并不怎么信宗教，但Yela“相信”末日，因为他几乎每夜都经过地狱。尽管如此，他仍有积极的态度，相信这只是pathway，会通向光明。
tattos是罪人的象征，而Yela有许多纹身，以此自讽

data.name: 洞主
data.text: （突然发现我登不上rapgenius了，以下均为记忆+自己的理解，可能有些不太准确）

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
[chorus 1: Yelawolf]
To the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit
I hold you neareast
My best friend, best friend
Let the trumpets blow with your appearance
I can almost hear it
My best friend, best friend
When you wish me hell upon my soul and spirit
Behold these lyrics
I got a best friend, best friend
Yeah, I got a best friend, best friend, yeah

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 这里best friend指的就是上帝（圣父圣子圣灵）。trumpets是圣经中描写天使或上帝出现时的音乐

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
[Verse 2: Yelawolf]
I don't know much about Holy Bibles
But I grew up in the Bible Belt
I put my love for a women on idle
Because I got beat with my mama's belt
But I learned from my mistakes
Try hard to respect people for what they believin' in
But if you spit on my fuckin' grave
And wish me Hell, then I wish you well
I'ma send you straight up to my best friend

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
这里有个很有趣的说法：But if you spit on my fuckin' grave
And wish me Hell, then I wish you well
I'ma send you straight up to my best friend
如果你跟我作对，我会直接送你去见我最好的朋友（上帝），之前网易云的翻译似乎说”我会直接认为你是我最好的朋友“，真是……希望是我记错了

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
[Chorus 2: Yelawolf]
To the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit
I hold you neareast
My best friend, best friend
Let the trumpets blow with your appearance
I can almost hear it
My best friend, best friend
When you wish me hell upon my soul and spirit
Behold these lyrics
I got a best friend, best friend
Yeah, I got a best friend, best friend, yeah

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 下面是阿姆的部分，不少人认为这是Eminem最精彩的verse之一。

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
God, please would you arm me with the armor
To calm me when there is drama like Gandhi?
Could have gone the other way many times
Could have turned Dalai with the llama

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
这里的大致意思是，Eminem祈求上帝让他在面对任何情形时都镇定下来，不至于进一步演变成暴力
这首歌里Yela的best friend指的是上帝，而Eminem的best friend指的是他的好友proof。proof在2006年不幸遭枪击去世，Eminem写过许多纪念他的歌，这就是其中之一。
这段verse的开始就有大量的bars
1、God赐予armor是圣经中的典故。
2、Gandi与proof的生日日期相同
3、Could have turned Dalai with the llama
达赖喇嘛（至少声称）代表和平。而llama则是枪的别称。这里的意思是，过去发生的事甚至有可能让Dalai也变得暴力
4、Gandi与gone the几乎是同音的

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
But I squashed my
Beef, and things seem
To be looking decent recently, but don't jinx it
It's like Clint Eastwood looking for peace though
Maybe not finna enter the priesthood

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
squash通常指在比赛中大获全胜。这里指Emimem在beef中总是获胜。有趣的是，squash有南瓜的含义，beef也有牛肉的含义。
Clint Eastwood是著名的西部片影星，他在电影中的形象是经常持枪(pistol), 这与peace though同音。Eminem用以形容他很难保持长期的和平。另外，Clint Eastwood也是proof喜爱的演员。

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
But at least should make an attempt to
Show some remorse and to be some sort of a repenter
For the people I've been a menace to
Not a preacher but a shit starter and finisher

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
这里将menace to发音得像是minister。这里是Eminem在道歉与反思, 可以这样拆开：
1、but at least should make an attempt to
Show some remorse and to be some sort of a repenter
For the people I've been a menace to
2、For the people I've been a minister, not a preacher but a shit starter and finisher

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
Enter the mind of a thick skin, but a short temper
This patience of mine is thinner
Than twine is when I
Get attacked, so I might say something back
That might offend you

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 又是一出双关. twine是线的意思，而attack同a tack, 穿线用的针

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
So if you don't like when I rap or what I have to
Say on the mic, then you might wanna act just
Like quarterbacks and take a fuckin' hike when
I snap 'cause
I'm a sinner, and I , I got a best friend, best friend

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 这里使用了橄榄球中的术语，sinner音同center, 在橄榄球中snap是由center传球给quarterback，而snap也有“怒气冲冲地说”的含义

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
Plus balls and intestines, and they never been yes men
They gon'll tell me when I'm fucked up the minute I'm ever givin' it less than
I'm about to vomit and I can feel it comin'
'Cause failure's somethin' I can barely stomach
And I only listen to my gut
So unless you're my fuckin' belly button
Don't tell me nuttin', you ain't my best friend, best friend

data.name: 洞主
data.text: Eminem用自己的器官来描述自己的自负，他只肯听从最亲近自己的。

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
Shout it out
Like there's never been a louder mouth
Should have never been allowed a mouth
Now that I got a higher power, now
When I blackout, power outage—oww
They powerless, but they crowd around
They tend to flock like shepherds, the black sheep
But I'll be the worst thing that these motherfuckers ever heard
When I'm counted out

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
a louder mouth与allowed a mouth同音；
关于power的一段其实没怎么懂……

post.text:
#Eminem bot
假期里不可能全身心地投入学习，必然有大量的空闲时间。让这些时间白白浪费不如试着了解一些有趣的东西，胜过虚度光阴。
很久以前就有很多rap歌曲在我的歌单里了，当然最主要的是姆爷的歌。但我最近才惊奇地发现以前自己就是在听个响，好像从未理解过lyrics。这几天打算慢慢更新一些自己喜欢的rap的verse的注释。有些verse真是精巧得如同诗篇。需要感谢rap genius上的注释，使我能够有可能理解它们。这个洞无非是转译而已。
day 1 
Best Friend  
Yelawolf  (feat.Eminem)
https://music.163.com/#/song?id=31421362&market=baiduqk
